summary: A conversion of Riften Watchtower into a player home aimed for warriors and barbarians.
descriptionHtml:
I discovered Riften Watchtower whilst out wandering in The Rift, and I found that I was rather intrigued by the whole structure. Seeing as I have a strong liking to player homes, I decided to give making my own a shot by converting the tower from a simple Orc lair into the home of a Nordic warlord and barbarian. This is my first attempt at modding for Skyrim, so it does not possess all the features that a more expertly-crafted home would. Regardless, I hope you enjoy using this simple tower as a home or outpost in your adventures in Skyrim.

Oh, and the views from the top are simply amazing. There aren't any requirements for this mod besides the base version of Skyrim.
author: PrimevalMonkey
